message: I propose we divide the money in a 3:1 ratio. This might seem like a fair split considering the first round.

Considering the inflation and the previous offers, I propose an equal split. This ensures both of us get a fair share despite the diminishing value of money with each round.
I think an equal split is too generous, considering the inflation. I'll try to get a better deal this round.
Given the inflation and the trend of decreasing offers, I propose a 60-40 split. This still benefits both of us while accounting for the diminishing value of money in each subsequent round.
